name: Scot Vick
text: Started with the Nancy Chopped Salad. Very tasty with excellent toppings including salami, cheese, garbanzo beans and tomatoes. Pizza of choice today was the Meatball and Mozzarella Buffalo. We watched them make pizza at the pizza bar. Fresh ingredients for sure.

name: Steve Florentz
text: Service A+ pickup or delivery service is always great..

name: Arnulfo L. Ayers
text: Delicious food. Had salads and pizza loved both. Wait staff did a good job I can‚Äôt wsot to go back and try more

name: David Gwaltney
text: Went there twice in a week - a weekday at 5 it was empty and delightful, & a Sunday at 2 - mobbed! Had the 'meat lovers' pizza both times - bacon, salami, sausage, etc. w/ fennel - delish! Had the prosciutto & buffalo mozarella as a starter ‚Ä¶More

name: Mandy Hance-Salsbury
text: They have the best pizza around. Brans new remodeling which is very nice. You can even eat in store now on their awesome new wooden tables. Even a 6 person table too.Great staff very nice people working there.

name: Laryssa Ziolkowski
text: Excellent service. Draven is the best!

name: Richard Hunt
text: With the virus going around you would think management Scott would be more aware of washing his hands after touching credit card machines then going back and touching food then touching trash can I had to tell another employee to tell Scott ‚Ä¶More

name: Geralyn Zastawnik
text: Not happy with double cheese that was non-existent. Crust very hard. No where near the last 2 times I ordered.   Be awhile before I order again

name: Bern M
text: This is the best Marcos! Great specialty pizzas. Finally reopened! Looks nice inside too!

name: Kendra C
text: As usual, GREAT pizza! üçï

name: Jullie Buckway
text: I asked for my cheese to not be cooked much and my pizza arrived hot and cooked exactly like I wanted it!!  The drivers and staff at the Middleburg location are friendly and professional.

name: Bill Honky Kong Pfeiffer
text: When are you guys reopening? I only go to this marcos...its my only favorite. I tried one other marcos but it was awful...now i refuse to get pizza from any other marcos.so whats the deal when can i get the awesome food back?when will you guys be open again?

name: Alyssa Michelle
text: We have been here so many times. The customer service is great. Thanks for always taking care of your customers!

name: Alyssa Michelle
text: Good price and offer special deals. Thin crust is great.

name: Scott B
text: Very rude and slow service. Called after an hour of waiting for a pizza to be delivered, I complained about the slow service and was hung up on. Called back to speak with the manager and he had the nerve to tell me the guy who answered the ‚Ä¶More

name: Robert Calton
text: I know Marco's is a chain, but this one is the BEST! Food is always fast and fresh, employees are friendly and they put a generous amount of cheese and toppings on! Not stingy with em like some other locations.

name: Ashley Lauren Havanec
text: Love Marcos! They are always super quick and always deliver well before the time promised.

name: Bill Slate
text: I like this store. There are others like it but this one is mine. They have yummy pizza and subs. I like their wings too. Oh, and now they have cookies. I should probably eat more a salads, but I don't.

name: Sharon Hamilton
text: Great pizza and subs and desserts .....worth the money

name: Krishna R
text: We tried after seeing rush infront of it.. my friends and myself liked it

name: Jeremy Simovic
text: Sexy girl in the back but the greek salad sucks so does all there food

name: Patricia Miller
text: Really good pizza with good prices and coupons

name: J S
text: It's a shame this place caught fire....I hope they re-open soon.

name: Richard Velez
text: Nice Marco's location really clean and they actually have a team that will get the order filled. I only wish they were a little more cheaper at cost.

name: Otama anna
text: great pizza and customer service

name: Jerry Majewski
text: I love Marcos.  Great food for the price.

name: Gilda Cruz-Rosa
text: I ordered Pizza on a very busy Thursday. The person who took my order got it wrong...when the delivery guy John came to my house (with the wrong order) he was super nice and went above and beyond to fixed my order. He brought me my salad ‚Ä¶More

name: Terri Lovett
text: Love their pizza and ceaser salads! Almost always plenty of sauce, toppings and ceaser dressing!

name: Emma
text: Fast service and polite staff

name: BulletproofBoyClouts
text: Tbh, the delivery guy kinda gave off the wrong vibes and to add to it I actually had to pay for my pizza then as I was taking bite into my slice of pizza thinking of how juicy and tender it was going to be it turned out to be stale and crunchy.. just my opinion

name: Joe Dixon
text: I repeatedly called for pizza but they hung up on me every time. Not likely to call back again. Plenty of other places to order pizza from.

name: Monique Androne
text:
I love their subs, the Italian is excellent!
Their pizza are good too! Can't beat the price!

name: David Chiasson
text: Fast, tasty, nice people, good prices. And cookies!

name: Amanda McKinnie
text: Fast food. Super friendly service :)

name: Peter Kolomichuk
text: Rude on the phone. Where I used to live Marcos was the favorite pizza place have tried several times from this one where where I live now .Don't expect to ever order pizza for delivery and have it at your house within less than an hour 15 ‚Ä¶More

text: This place is always fast. Usually, in 15 minutes. Also, the food is always good.
